author: Wayne Ferguson
text: "Yeah

author: N King
text: 'Nice venue. Only issue was accessing the site for the event.  Door was locked with no direction as to how to get in. Once access gained

author: Autohaus Int'l
text: 'Plisner house

author: warren jackson
text: "The food is delicious and this is the only place I'll actually drink a beer. Andrew
column5: Tony and of course Yari are absolutely great bartenders who make my drink perfect everytime! The management is great and was helpful with all our needs!"

author: Robert Marone
text: 'Great event space. Plenty of room

author: Shane King
text: 'This place is great
column5: I am planning on having our wedding at this location. They are very accommodating and flexible.'

author: Victoria Feinberg
text: 'Very cool place! Such a good vibe!'

author: NaomiM Morton
text: 'Cool space with great food'

author: Joseph Murgittroyd
text: 'Excellent place for a party.  The Host was Great and the Bartenders were Amazing. Two thumbs UP.!!!'

author: John Pope
text: 'Good for corporate events.'

author: Rich Milito
text: "What a great venue. We attended a 50th birthday party last Saturday night in this really cool restored turn-of-the-century building. The staff was amazing
column5: the waitstaff did a great job with passed hors d'oeuvres
column6: interacting with the guests and doing the little extra things like bringing over some cheese bites after my wife declined some previous items saying she preferred fried stuff. The bartenders were quick and efficient
column7: showing off the cocktail making skills and producing some great drinks. The buffet was well stocked and the staff made sure the chafing dishes were stocked and hot. Street parking was easy to find
column8: actually parked right in front of the door. Heard there is a lot nearby put didn't need it. Great time was had by all."

author: Michael Vega
text: 'Best cocktail bar in Hoboken it used to be open to the public but now is just an event space'

author: DeeLorri Photobooths
text: 'We did 2 gigs here. Both times the staff was helpful and venue is awesome. Vintage feel. Had a great time.'

author: Richard Hatter
text: 'Fun party / event venue!'

author: CT Jermin
text: 'Great space. Great vibe'

author: The Lions Den
text: 'Very nice atmosphere upon entering reminded me of a speakeasy. The bartender knew how to make a proper gin gimlet!! Great appetizers'

author: Brandon Bell
text: 'Drinks were very good and the bartenders knew how to make pretty much any drink in the book'

author: Stephen Lagano
text: 'Fun space.  Manager Vincent runs a great operation.'

author: Joe Minuti
text: 'Great food and a great place to dance'

author: ÍπÄÏôÑÎØ∏
text: 'We had our wedding party here. It was beautiful! Everything was so beautiful. Thanks to Kolo klubüíç Especially this venue is really great for Dacorators. Real wooden tables and so on.. Kolo klub is basically cozy and elegant'

author: Karen W
text: 'The bartenders are the best!!  The servers give the best service.  Their customer service is the best!'

author: Jessy Amane
text: 'Great atmosphere.  Super lovely decorations.  Bartenders are awesome.'

author: Antonello Raffaele
text: 'Awesome time great food great drinks'

author: Sabrina Nicole Terry
text: "The food wasn't for my taste but it's a nice place to do an event. Not alot of parking available on the street sides but they do have a parking lot. I wasn't very satisfied with my stay at an event going there. It could have been better and more organized. Also
column5: enough room to party that's for sure. They should have someone know how to get into the place it could be confusing if you haven't been there."

author: Conrad's Concessions Events
text: "Super professional staff!  I'd like to single out Vince for his exceptional customer service and punctuality.  From start to end Vince was an absolute delight to work with and very prompt with returning our calls and emails.  He was very quick to address any needs we had and would highly recommend this company to anyone!"

author: Mandi Abdalla Hernandez-Jimenez (MahJ)
text: 'Magical venue with great GREAT space & BAR
column5: magical bar (had a yummy cocktail called Sex on The Moon)
column7: elevator access and mock tails so the non drinking company can enjoy themselves as well.'

author: Keneth ruiz
text: 'Drinks are really great . More than amazing service\n.bartenders give u great service . 10/10'

author: Wanda Peterson
text: "They have an efficient set up for lunch. Food was good
column5: but the tacos were small for the price. I ordered guacamole and was charged for it
column6: but didn't get it so check your order before you leave. Chips and salsa were great."

author: David Edelstein
text: 'Great upstairs private party venue. Big and surprisingly kid friendly'

author: Caro Rendon
text: 'Beautiful and friendly place.'

author: Barbora Winterov√°
text: 'Cool place specially for someone with czech roots like me :) we had there our party with newly weds and I think it really worked out'

author: Elvis Tam
text: "Visited Kolo Klub first time for a B'Day party. Great place to hang out and enjoy some creative and fun delightful drinks. Bartenders are friendly and well skilled with drinks and  really enjoy their work. Will be back. BTW
column5: drink prices are just right. Place is on the 2nd floor
column6: above Pilsener Haus  (Awesome pretzels and Sausage and beer selections). Will find parking as well around the place because of the location.. However be careful and read ALL posted signs.. You are in Hoboken.."

author: Dan F
text: "Such a great place for an informal wedding celebration and I'm sure it's a great neighborhood bar when there's no private parties.  Loft environment   Good drink selection.  The staff really hussles to serve people."

author: Gabby Diogo
text: 'I hosted an event here and I have to say it was a great experience. They were very accommodating about everything and the execution was flawless.'

author: Brett Norton
text: 'Great place'

author: Louis Cabrera
text: "Nice place for a venue
column6: but there is a great bar set-up and the staff are fast and precise. From the christmas lights dangling around the room and old-styled glass cups
column7: this place was energetic and alive."

author: Douglas Gartner
text: 'Fantastic place for a reception. The bar and bartenders were amazing.  The place is very cool.'

author: Eric Shaw
text: 'Really great place
column5: generous drinks at an average value for Hoboken. Not filled with a bunch of college kids but rather 23-30 year olds which is a nice change.'

author: Nathan James
text: 'Good cocktails

author: Kris Heireth
text: 'Great cocktails.'
